Compute MOMF in parallel across multiple signatures

Source: R/cell_deconvolution.R
computeMOMF_parallel.Rd

Compute MOMF in parallel across multiple signatures

Usage

computeMOMF_parallel(TPM_matrix, sc_object, signatures, workers)

Arguments

TPM_matrix

A matrix with TPM normalized counts (genes symbols as rows and samples as columns).

sc_object

A matrix with the counts from scRNAseq object (genes as rows and cells as columns)

signatures

Path where signatures files are located

workers

Number of processes available to run on parallel.

Value

A matrix with cell abundance deconvolve with MOMF

On this page
